intro: Share your perspectives on emotion recognition systems.
p: Share this site! Emotion recognition systems raise important questions that we all need to consider. We deserve a say in how–and if–this technology is used.

questions.text: Now that you have explored our site, has your perspective on emotion recognition systems changed? Do you feel differently about the technology in particular, or their practical applications, or all of it? Please explain in the box below.
What examples of emotion recognition systems from the activities on this site do you find most interesting? Why?
What examples of emotion recognition systems from the activities on this site do you find most concerning? Why?
Have you ever experienced the practical application of emotion recognition systems in any form/capacity?
What examples of emotion recognition technology do you think should be explored in more detail?
In what ways can you imagine emotion recognition technology being used and what might be the impacts of these uses?
